name: DungeonSpell
description:
DungeonSpell

Play as a young witch-in-training who has gotten trapped in a dungeon. Escape the dungeon and solve 5 unique puzzles by summoning your ghostly friends to help you out!

FEATURES:

★ 4 cute ghost friends
★ 1 witch-in-training
★ 5 fun puzzles
★ a handy-dandy tutorial
★ you can fall in lava
★ relaxing lo-fi and lo-fi adjacent music
★ volume slider for your volume adjusting needs

CREDITS:

★ Karina Teruya (insta): character designer/artist, programmer, UI/UX, level designer
★ Michael Baker: base code

★ Environment Art Assets: "Dungeon Crawler Asset Pack" by Ignite Assets
